title: Beautiful, Spacious Two Bedroom Apt Near UST, Hamline, Macalester
posting_body: ['Description', 'HERE IS A LINK TO A VIDEO TOUR OF THE APARTMENT: https://youtu.be/JJ5epbFg9YMThis beautiful two-bedroom apartment has hardwood-style flooring, large windows, spacious living area, full kitchen and more!', '  The apartment also offers large closets for storage and spacious bedrooms.', 'Rent is $1,539 for up to two people.', ' Additional $50 for a third person.', ' Maximum of three persons in the apartment.', 'In addition to rent is electricity and a $39/mo amenities charge.', ' This is a required charge and covers a parking space in the lot and access to the building-wide WiFi network.', "Rent includes:  Heat  Water/Sewer  Household trash  Household recyclingSecurity deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'An application fee of $45 is due per applicant.', 'This is a smoke-free property.', 'The property is located conveniently at the corner of Marshall Ave and Prior Ave.', ' It is right on the bus line and a short walk to the green line light rail.', ' Access i94 nearby at the Snelling Ave or Cretin Ave entrances, too.', ' This property is convenient for anyone studying or working in downtown Minneapolis or Saint Paul.', ' It is also convenient for anyone studying or working at UST University of St. Thomas, Macalester College, the UofM University of Minnesota.', 'There are plenty of restaurants in the area.', ' Whole Foods and other grocery stores are within walking distance.', 'The entire property is smoke-free.', 'The property is three stories.', ' There is a shared laundry room on the first floor.', 'The laundry is coin-operated at $1.75-$2.00 per load.', ' There is also a parking lot at the rear of the building.', 'This property primarily offers two-bedroom apartments.', '\xa0These two-bedrooms are spacious at approximately 1,000SF.', 'Each feature a full kitchen with plenty of cabinets for pots and pans and dishes.', 'Each also offers four large closets for storage plus a pantry.', '\xa0The bedrooms are spacious and easily fit a queen size bed plus dresser.', '\xa0The larger bedroom could feature numerous different layouts of furniture.', '\xa0There are window-unit air conditioners in the living rooms.', 'These AC units provides adequate cooling for the entire apartment.', 'The property is located conveniently at the corner of Marshall Ave and Prior Ave.', '\xa0It is right on the bus line and
